thread.title: Agent Studio Presents An Exclusive Online Event With Mark Murphy
thread.title_full: Agent Studio Presents An Exclusive Online Event With Mark Murphy

title: Agent Studio Presents An Exclusive Online Event With Mark Murphy
text:
Last updated: 03:04 PM ET, Mon July 06 2015 Agent Studio Presents An Exclusive Online Event With Mark Murphy 
Agent Studio, a division of travAlliancemedia presents an exciting live event hosted by Mark Murphy that will help you eradicate any excuses you may have for not having a website or not having a website that works. YOU MAY ALSO LIKE Celebrate The 'Back to the Future' 30th Anniversary With... Entertainment 
Join Mark Murphy and the Agent Studio team at 2 p.m. ET this Wednesday, July 8 for a live and interactive discussion on why every travel professional should have a website. Over the years we’ve heard countless excuses as to why agents don’t have one. Excuses such as “I don’t have thousands of dollars,” to “My current website built years ago is fine,” and even “Do I really need a website?” 
Yes, as a travel professional competing with countless OTA’s the one thing you absolutely need is a website. There has never been a better time and an easier way to build a website that will compliment your personal brand as a travel agent. 
And this Wednesday, we’ll show you how you can now not only have a free website with Agent Studio but you’ll be able to utilize the brand new Marketing Center to connect with your clients in a way like never before. 
We’ve only unveiled this marketing center to current Agent Studio subscribers, and if you were lucky enough to get a glimpse of it at the Luxury Expo. It’s something you won’t want to miss and will revolutionize the way that you do business. 
Join Mark Murphy and the Agent Studio team on Wednesday – you can register now by clicking here . 
In fact after you register, head over to www.AgentStudio.com and build yourself a free website. Once you’ve had a chance to build your site and play around with the features, hop on the webinar on Wednesday and we’ll answer any questions you may have. 
We’ll see you on Wednesday!
